metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4389 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in lib/migrate.php in ownCloud before 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a crafted .htaccess file in an import.zip file and accessing an uploaded PHP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
